CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 24, 1946, pg. 25, reads: "And Down He Goes - Bacon Smith, West Virginia backfield ace, didn't get far on this play. In fact, he lost six yards when Johnson C. Smith's Joe Williams (30) hauled him down in game which West Virginia won, 6 to 0, last Saturday at Institute, W. Va. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: College football game with Johnson C. Smith #30 Joe Williams tackling West Virginia State Bacon Smith in foreground, and referee on left, West Virginia
CatSubject_tab: Men--West Virginia--Institute.Football--West Virginia--Institute.Football players--West Virginia--Institute.Athletic fields--West Virginia--Institute.
